title: Aseems
text: Asheems , or aseems as popularly known, is the ground floor canteen in Nehru Hall run by Mr. Ashim Bishal. It is popular for its wide and unique menu which has attracted a loyal following through the years. During the orientation program , students of Nehru are forbidden from eating here. [ unverified ] Paytm money wallet and BHIM payment interface is accepted for payments. Contact no is 9593719333

title: Timing
text: The timings are (usually) from 4 PM to 2 AM although this has been known to fluctuate widely.

title: Popular items
text: The Ashim's canteen is known for its Chicken Tandoori, Chotai, and Poha, although other dishes are popular as well.

title: Employees
text: Familiar employees include Mr. Ashim, Mr. Bapun, and Mr. Subir.

title: Controversy
text: In 2013, certain groups complained against Mr. Ashim for his use of child labor at the canteen. Consequently, he was was forced to enroll the children in question in a nearby school. [ unverified ]
